Control Name: 2.16.4 The lifecycle of the application is decoupled from its dependencies.
Control Statement: If the application lifecycle is closely coupled with that of its dependencies it can limit the operational agility of the application, particularly where new releases are concerned.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.16 What operational excellence allowances for reliability have you made?
